title: The Dragon in The Closet, Book One
description: Orin Bean just wants to be a normal kids, but a family curse had him running for his life. His only hope is the Dragon he found imprisoned in his Nana's closet.A compilation of the first three issues of the series with 3 new chapters from issue four.Nominated for the 2023 Outstanding Creator Awards!"The Dragon in The Closet" takes readers on a lively adventure through a magical realm where anything can happen. Readers will be enthralled with this fantasy comic book that captures the imagination with charming artwork and an interesting use of magic. If youâ€™re looking for a fun young adult comic book then I highly recommend this entertaining series."- Literary Titan Book Awards
author: Carolyn Watson-Dubisch
